Hi Jeff,

Thanks for the clarification. I agree that an investigation into the
activation functions would be interesting. I think generally output
over the range [-1,1] rather than [0,1] makes sense given that the
outputs ultimately become ANN connection weights. The alternative is
to use [0,1] and transform the outputs to [-1,1], which potentially
loses some of the elegance that symetry around 0 gives us.

Colin
